all Scrape common video host for URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi. Scrape common video host for URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplifying addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
GPL v3 https://github.com/noobsandnerds/noobsandnerds/tree/master/script.module.nanscrapers http://www.noobsandnerds.com/support/showthread.php?tid=17212 http://noobsandnerds.com
all Python Koding All In One Python Koding AIO contains a bunch of time saving modules that allows for quick and simple development. Although developed at totalrevolution.tv this also contains unique features which hook into the noobsandnerds.com framework so a big thanks to the team and users who keep the portals updated.
Creative Commons 4.0-NC-ND http://noobsandnerds.com/support/showthread.php?tid=17614 http://totalrevolution.tv Added new class from OptimusGREEN allowing for custom add-on settings https://github.com/totalrevolution/totalrevolution/tree/master/script.module.python.koding.aio
Tulip Helper module Tulip Routine Libraries are based on Lambda's "lamlib". It has some additions, most being in control module. all GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007 https://github.com/Twilight0/script.module.tulip
all This addon is almost exact copy Urlresolver from Tknorris repository https://github.com/tknorris/script.module.urlresolver. Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi. Website http://filmkodi.com . Our suport forum https://github.com/mrknow/filmkodi/issues. This addon is almost exact copy Urlresolver from Tknorris repository https://github.com/tknorris/script.module.urlresolver Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
